release.name: Lucide Icon System Refresh
release.notes: Lucide sprite sheet embedded everywhere: Tabs, Notifications, Buttons, Labels, and docs demos render pixel-perfect icons with automatic Unicode fallbacks. Adds rbxassetid image support to the icon resolver and refreshes README/CLAUDE guidance for the end-to-end workflow. Profiles manager now runs on the modern dropdown system with a dedicated QA harness.

changes: ğŸ® Controller chip now uses the Lucide icon resolverâ€”supports `lucide://`, emoji, `rbxassetid://`, or numeric IDs with automatic Unicode fallback.
ğŸª„ New APIs: `RvrseUI:SetTokenIcon` / `GetTokenIcon` and `Window:SetTokenIcon` / `GetTokenIcon` for per-hub or per-window customization.
ğŸ¨ Theme-friendly tinting with optional color overrides; fallbacks remain visible even if the sprite sheet fails to load.
ğŸ“˜ README updated with token customization examples plus refreshed badges/build stats.
ğŸ§¾ Version metadata bumped to v4.3.1 (build 20251020c) for release tracking.
ğŸª„ Lucide icons now render across ALL UI elements (Tabs, Notifications, Buttons, Labels) with consistent spacing and dedicated icon holders.
ğŸ–¼ï¸ Added rbxassetid:// image support to IconResolver so Roblox-hosted sprites render alongside lucide:// and emoji schemes.
ğŸ§© Buttons and Labels reserve a 24px icon lane with dynamic padding that prevents overlap when fallbacks or emojis are used.
ğŸ§µ Lucide sprite data is embedded into RvrseUI.lua and init build so executors load the sheet without extra HTTP calls.
ğŸ§ª Refreshed examples/test-lucide-icons.lua to showcase Buttons, Labels, Notifications, and Roblox asset icons in one scene.
ğŸ“š README.md now ships with a dedicated Lucide Icon System section, updated quick-start badges, and direct example links.
ğŸ—’ï¸ CLAUDE.md gains a developer log plus advanced guidance for regenerating lucide sprites and wiring new icons.
ğŸ”– VERSION metadata updated for v4.3.0 (build 20251020b, codename "Neon Atlas").
ğŸªŸ Minimize/restore flow tweaked so the window reopens from the controller chip at the exact saved position.
ğŸ§° Profiles tab now leverages the modern dropdown with single-select guards and ships with `examples/test-config-profiles.lua` for regression testing.
ğŸ¨ LUCIDE ICON LIBRARY INTEGRATION - 500+ professional icons via lucide:// protocol!

ğŸ” Icon resolution chain: Asset map â†’ Unicode fallback â†’ Text display

ğŸš€ Zero setup required - works immediately with automatic fallbacks

ğŸªŸ Integrated with WindowBuilder: plays on show/restore, stops on minimize, throttles on drag

ğŸ§ª Verified: No jumps, no offset drift, cursor stays glued to grab point
ğŸ‰ CRITICAL FIX: Multi-select dropdown blocker now works perfectly!
ğŸ› ROOT CAUSE: Lua closure upvalue capture bug - closures capture VALUES not references
